 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְכאֹת‎</span> **noun feminine** ==a spice==, (usually understood of ***tragacanth gum***, exuding from ***astralagus*** bush, [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>[[Gen.27.25|Gen 27:25]] and references</sup>; [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i. 64</sup> (and 249); compare also [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>§ 24</sup>; but = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***summitas rubicunda*** sive ***flores plantae*** (i.e. a certain plant, [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]), according to [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Aufsätze 4</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Gen.37.25|Gen 37:25]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לּט‎</span> as merchandise), [[Gen.43.11|Gen 43:11]] (+ ***id.***, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּבַשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּטְנִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁקֵדִים‎</span>, as gift).
